tool_description: gets news about your favorite team from a bunch of newspapers
name: fussballnews
title: fussballnews

api_list.name: Get News for Bundesliga Club
api_list.description: Gets articles for the specified club
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fussballnews.p.rapidapi.com/team/hertha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fussballnews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
